TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypedDataSetGenerator extends System.Object

span.span: Generates a strongly typed class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将使用提供的信息 （例如，XML 架构） 并创建类型化数据集类。The class takes information provided (for example, an XML schema) and creates a typed dataset class.

span.span: Generates a strongly typed class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成强类型 。Generates a strongly typed .

summary.span: 基于现有 生成强类型 。

span.span: Generates a strongly typed based on an existing .
A strongly typed .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成强类型 。Generates a strongly typed . 在所示的命名空间中创建数据集`codeNamespace`参数，并且数据集生成在托管编程语言中所示`codeProvider`参数。The dataset is created in the namespace indicated in the `codeNamespace` parameter, and the dataset is generated in the managed programming language indicated in the `codeProvider` parameter.
